name: Running From Power
description:
This game was made for the Ludum Dare Game Jam 39

You play as a hero that has become too strong, but your town is under attack from pirates.

If you don't use your power, your friends will all die - if you use your power, you will likely kill some of your friends but save some others.

What do you do?

How to play:

Press space bar to start playing the game

Move with arrow keys or wasd

Attack the pirates with space  bar

Note:

The web build seems to run a bit slowly at first - give it a bit and it'll improve

Credits:

Programming by me

City, characters, and particles downloaded from Unity Asset Store.

Music from Kevin Macleod (incompetech.com)

Sounds from freesound.org

Font from  (1001fonts.com)
